chat.web.bean

Class ChatRoomManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • chat.web.bean.ChatRoomManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    @Named(value="chatRoomManager")
 @ApplicationScoped
public class ChatRoomManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This managed bean manages the HTTP sessions, web-socket sessions, and chat room congregations for users of the chat room application.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ChatRoomManager() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void continueConversation(javax.websocket.Session session, java.lang.String message, MessageDispatcher.MediaType mediaType)
      This method handles the messages from a chat participant by locating the chat room for the conversation, building a message object to be stored in the database, and relaying the message to all chat participants in the room.
      void enterChatRoomLobby(java.lang.String httpSessionId, chat.ejb.entity.ChatRoomUser user)
      Upon a user entering the lobby, this method adds that user to the map of chat room users.
      void exitChatApplication(java.lang.String httpSessionId)
      This method removes a user from the HTTP session connections, WebSocket session connections, and active chat rooms.
      chat.ejb.entity.ChatRoomUser findChatRoomUser(java.lang.String userName)
      This method finds the user associated with the given username.
      java.lang.String findHostUsername(java.lang.String roomName)
      This method uses the given chat room name to find the host for the room.
      java.util.Map<chat.ejb.entity.ChatRoom,java.util.ArrayList<javax.websocket.Session>> getActiveChatRooms()
      This method returns the active chat rooms.
      java.lang.String getGuestRole()
      This method returns the guest role indicator.
      java.lang.String getHostRole()
      This method returns the host role indicator.
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getUsernamesForRoom(java.lang.String roomName)
      This method returns the usernames of the users in the named room.
      void init()
      This method constructs the maps for active chat rooms, WebSocket connections, and HTTP session connections.
      void inspectChatRoomUser(chat.ejb.entity.ChatRoomUser user, ProcessingStatus status)
      This method is performed prior to allowing a user to open or join a chat room.
      void joinChatRoom(javax.websocket.Session session, java.lang.String roomName, java.lang.String username)
      This method joins a guest user to the chat room identified by the given name.
      void leaveChatRoom(javax.websocket.Session session)
      This method removes the given user session from all chat rooms and notifies the associated chat room users via message.
      void openChatRoom(javax.websocket.Session session, java.lang.String roomName, java.lang.String username)
      This method opens a chat room for a user and adds it to the chat rooms map.
      ProcessingStatus processGuest(chat.ejb.entity.ChatRoomUser user, java.lang.String roomName)
      This method performs initial checks before allowing a user to join a chat room.
      ProcessingStatus processHost(chat.ejb.entity.ChatRoomUser user, java.lang.String roomName)
      This method performs initial checks before allowing a user to open a chat room.
      void sendMediaMessage(java.lang.String httpSessionId, java.lang.Long imageNumber, MessageDispatcher.MediaType mediaType)
      This method manages the task of creating and sending messages pertaining to uploaded images.

      • ChatRoomManager

        public ChatRoomManager()

    • Method Detail

      • init

        @PostConstruct
public void init()
        This method constructs the maps for active chat rooms, WebSocket connections, and HTTP session connections.

      • openChatRoom

        public void openChatRoom(javax.websocket.Session session,
                         java.lang.String roomName,
                         java.lang.String username)
        This method opens a chat room for a user and adds it to the chat rooms map.
        Parameters:
        session - the user session
        roomName - the room name
        username - the username

      • joinChatRoom

        public void joinChatRoom(javax.websocket.Session session,
                         java.lang.String roomName,
                         java.lang.String username)
        This method joins a guest user to the chat room identified by the given name.
        Parameters:
        session - the representative session
        roomName - the room name
        username - the username

      • continueConversation

        public void continueConversation(javax.websocket.Session session,
                                 java.lang.String message,
                                 MessageDispatcher.MediaType mediaType)
        This method handles the messages from a chat participant by locating the chat room for the conversation, building a message object to be stored in the database, and relaying the message to all chat participants in the room.
        Parameters:
        session - the session sending the message
        message - the message
        mediaType - the media type

      • leaveChatRoom

        public void leaveChatRoom(javax.websocket.Session session)
        This method removes the given user session from all chat rooms and notifies the associated chat room users via message. If the user is the creator of the chat room being vacated, the room is closed in the process.
        Parameters:
        session - the session

      • enterChatRoomLobby

        public void enterChatRoomLobby(java.lang.String httpSessionId,
                               chat.ejb.entity.ChatRoomUser user)
        Upon a user entering the lobby, this method adds that user to the map of chat room users.
        Parameters:
        httpSessionId - the HTTP session ID
        user - the chat room user

      • processHost

        public ProcessingStatus processHost(chat.ejb.entity.ChatRoomUser user,
                                    java.lang.String roomName)
        This method performs initial checks before allowing a user to open a chat room.
        Parameters:
        user - the user
        roomName - the room name
        Returns:
        the processing status

      • processGuest

        public ProcessingStatus processGuest(chat.ejb.entity.ChatRoomUser user,
                                     java.lang.String roomName)
        This method performs initial checks before allowing a user to join a chat room.
        Parameters:
        user - the user
        roomName - the room name
        Returns:
        the processing status

      • sendMediaMessage

        public void sendMediaMessage(java.lang.String httpSessionId,
                             java.lang.Long imageNumber,
                             MessageDispatcher.MediaType mediaType)
        This method manages the task of creating and sending messages pertaining to uploaded images.
        Parameters:
        httpSessionId - the HTTP session ID
        imageNumber - the number designated for the image
        mediaType - the media type

      • exitChatApplication

        public void exitChatApplication(java.lang.String httpSessionId)
        This method removes a user from the HTTP session connections, WebSocket session connections, and active chat rooms. The sign-out event is recorded and the map counts are logged.
        Parameters:
        httpSessionId - the HTTP session ID

      • findChatRoomUser

        public chat.ejb.entity.ChatRoomUser findChatRoomUser(java.lang.String userName)
        This method finds the user associated with the given username.
        Parameters:
        userName - the username
        Returns:
        the user or null if no user is found

      • inspectChatRoomUser

        public void inspectChatRoomUser(chat.ejb.entity.ChatRoomUser user,
                                ProcessingStatus status)
        This method is performed prior to allowing a user to open or join a chat room. First, the method performs a check to verify the given user exists. If the user is found, then the WebSocket connections are inspected to verify that the user is not already associated with a chat.
        Parameters:
        user - the chat room user
        status - the processing status

      • findHostUsername

        public java.lang.String findHostUsername(java.lang.String roomName)
        This method uses the given chat room name to find the host for the room.
        Parameters:
        roomName - the chat room name
        Returns:
        the username of the host

      • getUsernamesForRoom

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getUsernamesForRoom(java.lang.String roomName)
        This method returns the usernames of the users in the named room.
        Parameters:
        roomName - the room name
        Returns:
        the list of chat room usernames

      • getActiveChatRooms

        public java.util.Map<chat.ejb.entity.ChatRoom,java.util.ArrayList<javax.websocket.Session>> getActiveChatRooms()
        This method returns the active chat rooms.
        Returns:
        the active chat rooms

        public java.lang.String getHostRole()
        This method returns the host role indicator.
        Returns:
        the host role indicator
